Headline: #8 Halsted Temporary Reroute at Halsted/69th
ShortDescription: 8 Halsted buses are rerouted in both directions via Halsted, Marquette, Morgan, 69th, Halsted and over regular route, due to police activity near Halsted/69th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#8 Halsted buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Halsted, Marquette, Morgan, 69th, Halsted and over regular route, due to police activity near Halsted/69th.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Loop-bound Brown Line Delays
ShortDescription: Loop-bound Brown Line trains are running w/residual delays and congestion following an earlier door problem at Kedzie. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Loop-bound Brown Line trains are running w/residual delays and congestion following an earlier door problem at Kedzie.

Some trains and platforms may be busier than usual as crews work to restore normal service.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
